name: PulseCharge (itch)
description:
You are the Icon of Hearts, Anju, and it's your job to eliminate all the evil monsters that are contaminating your world. You possess a unique ability to turn the monster's negative energy against them! You must absorb, dodge and weave your way through intense gauntlets and defeat your evil self. Do you have the heart for such a challenge?

AVAILABLE NOW!!!


What's in store:

  1. Absorb enemy attacks to charge up your own!
  2. Intense levels that will test your platforming and speedrunning prowess.
  3. Soothing Soundtrack.
  4. Gamepad support, rebindable keys and resolution options.
  5. DRM-Free

For more Information and updates check out my Youtube, Twitter or FaceBook!
